kv5.3:2.7: Hañci kusalaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv5.3:3.1: ☑ Anicce niccanti vipariyeso, so ca akusaloti?
kv5.3:3.3: Pathavīkasiṇaṁ samāpattiṁ samāpannassa viparīte ñāṇaṁ, tañca akusalanti?
kv5.3:3.7: asubhe subhanti vipariyeso, so ca akusaloti?
kv5.3:3.9: Pathavīkasiṇaṁ samāpattiṁ samāpannassa viparīte ñāṇaṁ, tañca akusalanti?
kv5.3:4.1: ☑ Pathavīkasiṇaṁ samāpattiṁ samāpannassa viparīte ñāṇaṁ, tañca akusalanti?
kv5.3:4.3: Anicce niccanti vipariyeso, so ca kusaloti?
kv5.3:4.5: pathavīkasiṇaṁ samāpattiṁ samāpannassa viparīte ñāṇaṁ, tañca akusalanti?
kv5.3:4.9: asubhe subhanti vipariyeso, so ca kusaloti?
kv5.3:5.5: Hañci arahā pathavīkasiṇaṁ samāpattiṁ samāpajjeyya, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv5.3:6.1: ☑ Pathavīkasiṇaṁ samāpattiṁ samāpannassa viparīte ñāṇaṁ, arahā pathavīkasiṇaṁ samāpattiṁ samāpajjeyyāti?
kv5.3:8.3: Hañci natthi arahato saññāvipariyeso cittavipariyeso diṭṭhivipariyeso, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv5.3:9.6: Tena hi pathavīkasiṇaṁ samāpattiṁ samāpannassa viparīte ñāṇanti.
kv5.3:10.3: Nanu pathavī atthi, atthi ca koci pathaviṁ pathavito samāpajjatīti?
kv5.3:10.5: Hañci pathavī atthi, atthi ca koci pathaviṁ pathavito samāpajjati, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv5.3:11.1: ☑ Pathavī atthi, pathaviṁ pathavito samāpajjantassa viparītaṁ hotīti?
kv5.3:11.3: Nibbānaṁ atthi, nibbānaṁ nibbānato samāpajjantassa viparītaṁ hotīti?
